entry.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Welton Street CafeCOVID-19 has hit us hard. Many harder than others. We at Welton Street Cafe try to be here to...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280Welton Street Cafe

COVID-19 has hit us hard. Many harder than others. We at Welton Street Cafe try to be here to support our community in the ways that we can. If you are in need ...of employment and have relevant work experience, then please send us your resume. We are now accepting resumes for both the front and the back of the house.

entry.title: **********ATTENTION: URGENT MATTER**********...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

**********ATTENTION: URGENT MATTER**********

#WindsorGardensPhoneZap
After community came for their necks just last week, Windsor Gardens is back at it with another member of their community battling racial injustice. Call and demand their Community Response team immediately stop all persecution of Sherry Dillahunty all day today 1/6/2021.

...

Ms. Dillahunty’s neighbors are weaponizing Community Response and Covenant Enforcement and the police against her and openly admit to it!

Call now and keep calling to let them know community is watching we will not stand by and watch as their tenants engage in racial terror against our elder!

Use this sample script:
“Hello, my name is _____ and I am calling to demand that the Community Response and Covenant Enforcement at Windsor Garden stop allowing racist neighbors to terrorize Sherry Dilahunty. Ms. Dillahunty has the right to move freely through her community and we will not stand for any further discrimination against her from Windsor Gardens. “

#BlackLivesMatter
#TheFightContinues
#TheTimeisNow
#ApplyPressure

[Image description: White and yellow words on a black background that reads, “CALL TO ACTION. Hashtag Windsor Gardens Phone Zap. CALL NOW! Director of Community Response and Convenant Enforcement: Chris Scovil. Phone: 303-364-7685 x1515. Email: cscovil@wgamail.com. Community Response Captain of Operations: Eddie Strock. Phone: 303-364-4924. Email: estrock@wgamail.com. The rest of the image includes the same text as this post. Black Lives Matter 5280 logo at the bottom.]

entry.title: Period.
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Period.

Adding any other marginalized identity to Blackness is another layer of oppression to fight. Black queer people living their truths is a beautiful resistance.

bostonglobe.com

Black queer lives are Black lives that matter, too - The Boston Globe

Adding any other marginalized identity to Blackness is another layer of oppression to fight. Black queer people living their truths is a beautiful resistance.Adding any other marginalized identity to Blackness is another layer of oppression to fight. entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280When Black doctor Susan Moore died from COVID-19 after posting a video from her hospital bed describing racist treatment by medical staff, her chilling message was compared to the video of George Floyd begging for his life as he was killed by Minneapolis police. We speak to two leading Black women d...

democracynow.org

entry.title: Good morning and happy Kwanzaa, beautiful people! The seventh...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Good morning and happy Kwanzaa, beautiful people! The seventh and final principle of Kwanzaa is IMANI, which means FAITH. How do you show your community, your teachers, your family, and YOURSELF that you have faith in them?

entry.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280’s Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...

coloradogives.org

Black Lives Matter 5280
